title: INtravel
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: The most-exciting new airline routes of 2025 (so far)
items.description: Our aviation team looked at the all of the new routes launched in the first half of 2025 — and we came up with this top 15 list.

items.title: The best credit cards for purchasing a car
items.description: If you're considering purchasing a car with a credit card, here is everything you need to know and which credit cards we recommend.

items.title: Onboard Etihad’s A321LR delivery flight: Behind the scenes from Airbus to Abu Dhabi
items.description: This is Etihad's first single-aisle plane to feature lie-flat pods in both first and business class, and it'll unlock new routes and unique deployment...

items.title: It's getting easier: 5 essential tips on how to get a Global Entry appointment
items.description: Hacks for getting an appointment for Global Entry approval and how to get it for free.

items.title: Why you should hold both the Chase Sapphire Reserve for Business and Ink Business Preferred
items.description: Carrying both the Chase Sapphire Reserve Business and Ink Business Preferred as a business owner can be beneficial for several reasons.
